sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, there is no character named Ser Vance Corbray. There are two known Corbray knights, brothers to Lord Lyonel Corbray, Ser Lyn and Ser Lucas. Ser Lyn is a noted warrior, but is also known to be a pedophile, preferring young boys.

'''Vance Corbray''' is a minor character in the [[Season 4|fourth season]], played by [[Richard Doubleday]]. SerÂ Vance CorbrayÂ is a [[Knighthood|knight]] of [[House Corbray]], a [[noble house]] sworn to [[House Arryn]] of [[the Eyrie]].
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 4]]===
Ser Vance, along with Lord [[Yohn Royce]] and Lady [[Anya Waynwood]], sits on a tribunal to investigate the death of [[Lysa Arryn]]. Like the other judges, Ser Vance assumes foul play on Littlefinger's part. During the tribunal, Ser Vance is made aware that [[Petyr Baelish]]'s niece, "Alayne", is actually [[Sansa Stark]], but he agrees to keep her secret and accepts her testimony that Lady Arryn committed suicide.<ref>"[[The Mountain and the Viper]]"</ref>
